actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the expenditure of funds not needed for purposes of the Department of Justice Assets Forfeiture Fund and the Customs Forfeiture Fund for purposes of emergency prison construction.
short_title: Emergency Prison Construction Funding Act of 1987
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Emergency Prison Construction Funding Act of 1987 - Authorizes the expenditure of funds not needed for the purposes of the Department of Justice Assets Forfeiture Fund and the Customs Forfeiture Fund for: (1) emergency prison construction; and (2) grants for drug law enforcement programs.

titles.title: Emergency Prison Construction Funding Act of 1987
A bill to authorize the expenditure of funds not needed for purposes of the Department of Justice Assets Forfeiture Fund and the Customs Forfeiture Fund for purposes of emergency prison construction.
